Our amazing organizers

Kids Hack Day is enabled by passionate people from all walks of life all over the world who shares our values and vision. For anyone who have organized a Kids Hack Day event and want to take a lead role in supporting their local community of organizers we have created an ambassador program. To read about what other ambassadors are saying see the testimonials below. If you want to become an ambassador yourself please apply here by contacting murilo@kidshackday.com
